name: Personal Portfolio
description: Luckily you don't have to go anywhere, because you are already here! But if you're interested in looking inside, check out the github link below.

name: Lettuce Meet
description: What started as a joke during a bootcamp immersive became an attempt at an application to organize get togethers with friends outside of existing applications.

name: Student Rooster
description: Half coding exercise/half attempt to solve a problem for a dance school. The purpose of which is to keep track of what classes students have taken.
